text: San Sebastián University (Universidad San Sebastián) is a private university in Chile with headquarters in Santiago. Some faculties are in Concepción, Puerto Montt and other cities of Chile. == History == It was founded and established in 1989, state-recognized in 2001. == Faculties == * Architecture * Art and Design * Health Sciences * Social Sciences * Law * Business & Economy * Engineering & Technology * Veterinary medicine * Medicine & Nursing * Dental & Medical Technology * Education == Other websites == * Universidad San Sebastián official website Category:Private Chilean universities Category:Colleges and universities in Santiago, Chile Category:1989 establishments in Chile Category:Colleges and universities in Concepción
title: San Sebastián University
